quiz.title: Speaking Part 1: Work and Studies
quiz.instruction: In this part, the examiner will ask you general questions about yourself and a range of familiar topics, such as home, family, work, studies and interests.

chats.content: Good afternoon. My name is Sarah. Could you tell me your full name, please?
Good afternoon, Sarah. My name is Nguyen Van A.
Thank you. And can I see your identification?
Yes, certainly. Here is my passport.
Thank you, that's fine. Now, in this first part, I'd like to ask you some questions about yourself. Let's talk about what you do. Do you work or are you a student?
I am currently a student at the University of Science.
I'm majoring in Computer Science. I find it very interesting because I love technology and problem-solving.
Why did you choose that subject?
Well, ever since I was young, I've been fascinated by computers. I think it's a field with a lot of potential for the future.
